meanings.definition: The study or collection of myths
meanings.sent1: In her mythographies class, she learned about ancient stories and legends.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to mythographies from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The mythographies professor had a magical pen that brought myths to life.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of mythographies waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The art of mythographies painted pictures of gods and heroes in her mind.

meanings.definition: A written account or representation of myths
meanings.sent1: The book on Greek mythographies was filled with fascinating tales of gods and monsters.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient scrolls containing mythographies of creation stories.
meanings.sent3: The children's mythographies book had illustrations that made the myths come alive.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling was so vivid; it felt like he was reading from a book of mythographies.
meanings.sent5: The author's mythographies were so detailed that readers felt transported to another world.
